member.name: T:Amazon.CostAndUsageReport.AmazonCostAndUsageReportClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing CostAndUsageReport
All public APIs for AWS Cost and Usage Report service

member.name: M:Amazon.CostAndUsageReport.AmazonCostAndUsageReportClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonCostAndUsageReportClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.CostAndUsageReport.AmazonCostAndUsageReportClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonCostAndUsageReportClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
member.param: The region to connect.

member.exception: This exception is thrown on a known dependency failure.

member.exception: This exception is thrown when putting a report preference with a name that already exists.
This exception is thrown on a known dependency failure.
This exception is thrown when the number of report preference reaches max limit. The max number is 5.
This exception is thrown when providing an invalid input. eg. Put a report preference with an invalid report name, or Delete a report preference with an empty report name.
